category-def.name: com.verticon.tracker.premisesEditor
category-def.label: Premises Editor
category-def.description: Editor for creating and managing Livestock Premises Information.

category-def.name: com.verticon.tracker.fairEditor
category-def.label: Fair Editor
category-def.description: Editor for creating and managing people and livestock exhibits at a Fair or Animal Exhibition. Supplements functionality of the Tracker Premises Editor.

category-def.name: com.verticon.tracker.optionalFeatures
category-def.label: Optional Features
category-def.description: Optional features adding functionality to the base Premises Editor.

category-def.name: com.verticon.tracker.birt
category-def.label: Business Intelligence Reporting Tool (BIRT)
category-def.description: Eclipse Business Intelligence Reporting Tool (BIRT) Designer, Runtime, and Tracker enablement features.
